name: Border-magic
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fGammaAdj=2.050000
fDecay=0.980000
fVideoEchoZoom=2.000000
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.000000
nVideoEchoOrientation=3
nWaveMode=3
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=1
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=1
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=1
bDarkenCenter=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=0.900000
fWaveScale=0.599579
fWaveSmoothing=0.600000
fWaveParam=0.000000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.001829
fWarpScale=1.001828
fZoomExponent=2.100000
fShader=0.300000
zoom=1.008151
rot=-0.020000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000000
dy=0.000000
warp=1.007607
sx=1.000000
sy=1.000000
wave_r=0.600000
wave_g=0.600000
wave_b=0.600000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
ob_size=0.010000
ob_r=0.010000
ob_g=0.000000
ob_b=0.000000
ob_a=1.000000
ib_size=0.005000
ib_r=0.000000
ib_g=0.250000
ib_b=0.000000
ib_a=1.000000
nMotionVectorsX=1.000000
nMotionVectorsY=1.000000
mv_l=0.900000
mv_r=0.900000
mv_g=1.000000
mv_b=1.000000
mv_a=0.000000
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.823*time) + 0.40*sin(0.916*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.900*time) + 0.40*sin(1.023*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.808*time) + 0.40*sin(0.949*time) );
per_frame_4=rot =rot + 0.030*( 0.60*sin(0.381*time) + 0.40*sin(0.579*time) );
per_frame_5=decay = 0.99;
per_frame_6=warp = 0;
per_frame_7=ib_r=bass;
per_frame_8=ib_g=mid;
per_frame_9=ib_b=treb;
per_pixel_1=zoom=1+(bass*0.2)*0.1;
per_pixel_2=warp=warp+pow(rad,1.3)*2.0;
per_pixel_3=zoomexp =1 - 1*sin(rad*time*10);
per_pixel_4=sx=sx+0.07*sin(rad*18 + time*9);
per_pixel_5=sy=sy+0.07*sin(rad*18 + time*9);
fRating=5.000000
